organic.title: Tidy up your digital life with these organizer apps
organic.snippet: Stardock Software has a whole host of programs and apps that can alter your desktop and file organization but Fences stands out for us. Fences is a file organizer that essentially lets you corral files together (or “fence” them in) so that relevant files, folders, and icons ...

organic.title: Activision Announces Vigilante 8®: Arcade for Xbox Live Arcade
organic.snippet: Licensed and developed by Isopod Labs, Vigilante 8: Arcade is an all new remake of the original game, featuring online play with up to eight players and a host of new content, taking full advantage of next-generation technologies. The title is scheduled for release via download on Xbox LIVE Arcade for Xbox 360 this ...
